Comments_List: I learned about limits, derivatives, and integrals. I also developed better math study skills.
I learned a lot about math
I became more familiar with calculus and its applications
More practice and less exam content on things that were just learned.
I thought the course was good
I thought the course had a strong curriculum. The webassign made it very difficult to get feedback on problems that I didn't understand.
It is very well planned out and taught however when it came to the final its difficulty was unlike that of anything beforehand from the classwork to the psets or the midterms.
I would recommend this course if Sarah Vigliotta is teaching.
If you must. But the final was not representative of the study material of previous years so I and many others found it to be much more difficult than expected.
Yes, I would say to take it with Prof. Vigliotta!
Yes because i had a good teacher
If they need to take math yes.
I would recommend it for a qr requisite.
For those who don't have it as a requirement for their major or other classes but need a QR credit I would suggest going in another direction.
